alert.note: Alert for Colleton; Dorchester (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 16 at 11:35PM EDT until August 17 at 12:30AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM EDT THURSDAY FOR COLLETON AND DORCHESTER COUNTIES... At 1134 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated light showers moving across the warned area. The risk for additional flash flooding is ending. If trends continue, the warning may be cancelled early. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Heavy rain producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Walterboro, Canadys, Sidney, Hiotts, Colleton Medical Center, Rhodes Crossroads and Stokes. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
